ej,aquil001,P,vanol901,Fighting ej,desto001,P,vanol901,Charging mound ej,gilkb001,P,vanol901,Fighting ej,watsa001,P,vanol901,Intentional HBP $Orestes Destrade charged the mound; pitcher Allen Watson threw his glove at Destrade, knocking off the latter's glasses and cutting the bridge of his nose; Destrade threw a couple of punches; both benches emptied; Bernard Gilkey and Luis Aquino fought; Gilkey accidentally punched 1B umpire Charlie Reliford on the back of the head; Destrade, Watson, Gilkey and Aquino ejected by HP umpire Larry Vanover; Cardinals manager Joe Torre played the game under protest

ej,wilkr001,P,froeb901,Allowing a pitch to hit HP umpire $catcher Rick Wilkins missed a swinging third strike and the ball struck HP umpire Jerry Crawford on the chest; Crawford was bent over in pain for a few minutes and the other umpires gathered around Crawford; 3B umpire Bruce Froemming and Wilkins started shouting at each other and Wilkins was ejected by Froemming; Froemming had been hurt last year when a pitch got past Wilkins and Froemming said after the game that umpires seem to get hurt when Wilkins catches

ej,lachr101,M,tatat901,Fair/foul call (Reversed) $Ryan Klesko's fly hit the screen on the LF pole; it was ruled a foul ball by 3B umpire Terry Tata; Braves manager Bobby Cox argued the call and the umpires huddled, reversing the ruling to a home run; Marlins manager Rene Lachemann came onto the field and argued with each umpire until he was ejected by Tata
